Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: KMD is a platform and it provides all in one blockchain solution for businesses that want to utilize blockchain in their businesses. But to help identify whether a business need blockchain or not - is the job of the businesses. Probably the bottleneck is to identify and implement a more efficient solution using blockchain to current situation/problems. This is a new uncharted territory.  I think
